title: SPIA Advisory Council Co-Chair Cindy Huang MPA ’02 Named USAID Policy Director | Princeton School of Public and International Affairs
snippet: A 2002 MPA graduate, Huang is co-chair of SPIA’s Advisory Council. She credits the School of Public and International Affairs for helping her reach her professional goals.
